titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting free-quarter, or taking any provisions in the counties of Oxford, Berks, and Wilts, without paying upon paine of death.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given ... at Our court at Oxford, this first day of December. 1643.
Arms 37; Steele notation: Berks, to un-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
